Text:
I've got this one already, but I thought I should catch up on thank you notes.

You have enriched my life froogAL.

I cannot even keep track of the many fine jazz torrents I have acquired through your good graces (but I seed them all to at least a 2:1 ratio over time, and never leave a torrent with less than two seeders in spite of my less-than-state-of-the-art connection).

This is a good one. so was Sonny Stitt the Eddie Buster Sides and so many others. 

Lossless forever!!! Excelsior!!! (did I spell that correctly?)

RE: The Eddie Buster Sides...

See my comment on tiddler222's recent upload of Ella Fitzgerald - Get Happy.
Kind words.........There simply isn't enough time to hear all the "undiscovered" great music available to us via the silicon miracle......PAY IT FORWARD
svidrigailovjones.....More Art Blakey coming your way!  Stay tuned........THX...fA
